title: Famous Grouse
author: Famous Grouse
content: Next X2 to X5 gem 💎 is nothing else but $Take takepile_, a low mcap and criminally undervalued gem on the Fantom Chain. takepile_ is a perpetual dex protocol that allows you do much more than trading derivatives and perpetuals.We have seen the likes of $GMX, $GNS and $MYC pull some huge greens over the last few months.Why? The Perpetual DEX Narrative 🏌‍♂️takepile_ is a microcap perpetual dex with zero funding rates, RealYields  no false liquidation and Leverage up to 200X on Fantom network 😯The team is actively building and transparent. $Take has a total supply of 10m and circulating supply of 1m with no plans for an unlock anytime soon.It has a mcap of 284k and an fdv of 2.8m which is on the increase 🤔.. Just found this Gem frens what are your take in this Gem?
